sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> gets a nice uniform for the <radical>sake</radical> of not wanting to look like a <kanji>fake</kanji>. The leader is a fake, he just doesn’t want to look like one. He’s not really a leader, but he thinks he should get an official-looking uniform for the sake of not looking like a fake.
meaningInfo: Look at this fake leader. See him scramble into a uniform. Does he look like a real leader? Or can you tell that he is a fake?
readingMnemonic: Well, everyone found out he was a <kanji>fake</kanji> anyway, and now you're all going to use a <reading>gui</reading>llotine (<ja>ぎ</ja>) to cut off his fake head.
readingInfo: Watch as the guillotine comes down. You close your eyes for a second, and when you open them you see that the leader's body was a fake! Wait, where did he go?!
